name: unaffiliated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not connected with or controlled by a group or organization: The man who helped him was unaffiliated with the church.
US used to refer to people who do not state that they support a particular political party when they register to vote: Of the district's 476,535 registered voters, 39% are Republicans, 34% are unaffiliated and 27 % are Democrats.
